errors.loadingPricesFailed: Unable to load prices from server.

electricityProvider.customTariffDescription: Here you can define your own tariff. This will then be displayed in the list of available tariffs.
electricityProvider.customTariffFormula: Formula for the custom tariff (e.g. 0.2 * price + 5)
electricityProvider.customTariffFormulaDescription: Powerchart uses mathjs to calculate the price. Here are some examples:

name.title: Custom grid name
name.placeholder: Enter a name for the custom grid

fees.title: Custom grid fees (JSON format)
fees.placeholder: Enter the grid fees in JSON format
fees.description: This JSON schema allows you to configure a list of fee definitions, where each fee definition contains identifying information and a schedule of applicable values. Each entry in the top-level array represents one fee configuration.

sidebar.disableSurroundingLayoutDescription: This option hides the surrounding layout of the page to create more space for the charts. To disable this option again, you must manually remove the setting from the URL.
